Translations.Text: Ta ha
Ware ga anata ni kuruan o kudashita no wa, anata o nayamasu tamede wanai
Omo o osoreru mono e no, kunkai nihokanaranai
Daichi to takai sho ten to o tsukuri nasa reru, kare kara kudasa reta keijidearu
Jihibukaki okata wa, gyokuza ni chinza nasa reru
Ten ni ari-chi ni aru mono, soshite sonoaida ni aru subete no mono, mata, shimetta tsuchi no shita ni aru mono wa, subete kare no monodearu
Tatoe anata ga ogoe de hanashite mo (Sekiri naku), kare wa, hime rareta koto mo kakusa rete iru koto mo shitte ora reru
Arra, kare no soto ni kami wa nai nodearu. Mottomo utsukushi gyomei wa kare ni zokusuru
Musa no monogatari ga, anata ni todoita ka
Kare ga hi o mite, kazoku ni itta toki no koto o omoi nasai. `Tomare, watashi wa hi o mita. Tabun asoko kara, hi-wa o mochikaeru koto ga dekiyou. Aruiwa ano hi de, michibika reru kamo shirenai
Daga kare ga soko ni kita toki,-goe ga atte yoba reta. `Musa yo
hontoni ware wa anata no omodearu. Dakara kutsu o nuge. Ima anata wa, towa no hijiridani ni iru nodearu
Ware wa anata o eranda. Dakara (anata ni) keiji suru koto o kike
Hontoni ware wa arradearu. Ware no soto ni kami wanai. Dakara ware ni tsukae, ware o kokoro ni daite reihai no tsutome o mamore
Tashikani (shumatsu no)-ji wa kuru nodearuga, sore o himete okitai no wa, kakujin ga doryoku shita tokoro ni oji, mukui o uke saseru tamedearu
Dakara, kore o shinjinaide jibun no yokubo ni shitagau-sha-tachi kara tozakari, anata o hametsu kara sukue
Anata no migite ni aru soreha nanika, musa yo
Kare wa moshiageta. `Kore wa tsuedesu. Watashi wa kore ni motare, mata hitsuji no tame ni kore de (konoha o) uchiotoshi, mata, sono soto no yo ni kyoshimasu
Kare wa ose rareta. `Musa yo, sore o nage yo
Kare ga sore o nageta tokoro, sokuza ni soreha hebi ni natte, hai mawatta
Kare wa ose rareta. `Sore o osae yo. Osorete wa naranai. Ware wa sore o gen no yo ni kaesudearou
Sorekara anata no te o, wakinoshita ni ire yo. Nani no sawari mo nai no ni, sore wa shiroku narou. Kore wa imahitotsu no shirushi
Ware ga saidai no shirushi o, anata ni shimesu tamedearu
Anata wa firuaun no moto ni ike. Hontoni kare wa koman hidodearu
Kare wa (inotte) itta. `Omo yo, watashi no mune o hirogete kudasai
Watashi no shigoto o yoi ni shite kudasai
Watashi no shita no motsure o hogushite
watashi no kotoba o, kare-ra ni wakara sete kudasai
Mata watashi no kazoku no naka kara, enjo-sha o o sazuke kudasai
Watashi no kyodai, harun o
watashi ni kasei shi
watashi no shigoto ni kyoryoku suru yo ni sa sete kudasai
Sore wa watashi-tachi ga, anata o oku tatae
mata fudan ni anata o nenzuru tamedearimasu
Hontoni anata koso, watashi-tachi o mimamori kudasa reru katadearimasu
Kare wa ose rareta. `Musa yo, hontoni anata no negai wa kikitodoke rareta
Ware wa, konomae ni mo anata ni megumi o hodokoshita
Sonotoki wa, waga ishi o anata no haha ni tsutaeta

“(Sonoko o) hako no naka ni irete, kawa ni nage yo. Kawa ga kare o kishi ni uchi age, ware no tekideari, mata kono-ko no teki ga hiroiageyou. ” Soshite anata no ue ni, ware no ai o sosogi kakeru. Sorede ware no me (hogo) no moto de sodate rareru koto ni narou

Sonotoki anata no ane ga, makari dete,“watashi ga (Sonoko o) sodateru mono o, o oshie shimashou ka. ” To itta. Koshite ware wa, haha no te ni anata o kaeshi, sorede kano on'na mo manzoku shi, kanashimi mo kieta. Mata anata wa hito o koroshita. Daga ware wa kuno kara anata o sukui, iroiro to anata o kokoromita. Sorekara su-nen no ma, madoyan no min no naka ni taizai shi, sorekara sadame rareta yo ni, anata wa koko ni kita nodearu. Musa yo
Ware wa anata o ware (ni hoshi sa seru) tame ni, sodateageta
Anata to kyodai wa, ware no shirushi o tazusaete ike. Soshite ware o nenzuru koto o okotatte wa naranai
Anata gata ryonin wa firuaun no moto ni ike. Hontoni kare wa koman hidodearu
Daga kare ni monoshizukana toki-kata de katare. Kare wa kunkai o ukeireru ka, matawa ware o osorerudearou
Kare-ra ryonin wa itta. `Omo yo, hontoni kare ga isoide watashi-tachi ni (gai o kuwae) mata hogai no koto o suru no o osoremasu
Kare wa ose rareta. `Osoreru koto wanai. Hontoni ware wa, anata gata to issho ni iru. Kiite ori mite iru nodearu

Dakara anata gata ryonin wa okonatte, kare ni itte yaru ga i. “Hontoni watashi-tachi wa, anata no omo no shitodearu. Dakara watashi-tachi to issho ni Isuraeru no shison-tachi o shakuho shi, kare-ra o kurushimete wa naranai. Hontoni watashi-tachi wa, shirushi o motte anata no nushi kara kita monodearu. Onmichibiki ni shitagau mono wa, heiandearu
Hontoni watashi-tachi ni, tashika ni keiji sa reta nodearu. Kyohi suru mono mata somuki saru mono ni wa chobatsu (ga machikamaete iru dakedearu).”
Kare (firuaun) wa itta. `Musa yo, anata gata no omo wa daredearu no ka
Kare wa (kotaete) itta. `Watashi-tachi no omo koso wa, ban'yu o sozo shi, hitorihitori ni (sugata ya shishitsu sono soto o) fuyo sa re, sarani michibiki o ataeru katadearu
Kare (firuaun) wa itta. `Sorenara sugisatta sedai no mono wa do naru no ka
Kare wa itta. `Sore ni kansuru chishiki wa, shosatsu ni shirusa rete omo no omoto ni arimasu. Watashi no omo wa, ayamari o okasu koto mo naku, wasureru koto mo arimasen

Kare wa, daichi o anata gata no gasho to sa re, anata gata no tame, soko ni michi o tateyoko ni tsuke, mata ten kara ame o furase rareru. Sore ni yotte, ware wa sorezore no kotonatta shiyu no shokubutsu o seicho sa seru
Tabe, mata anata gata no kachiku o hoboku shi nasai. Hontoni sono nakaniha, richi aru mono e no shuju no shirushi ga aru
Ware wa, sore (doro) kara anata gata o tsukuri, soreni anata gata o kaera se, mata sore kara imaichido hikidasu nodearu
Ware wa kare (firuaun) ni, subete no waga shirushi o shimeshita nodaga, kare wa kyogidearu to shite kyohi shita
Kare wa itta. `Musa yo, anata gata wa majutsu de, kono kuni kara watashi-tachi o oidasu tame ni kita no ka
Sorenara, watashi-tachi mo sono yona majutsu o anata ni mochidasou. Sa, watashi-tachi to anata no ma de yakusoku shite kokai no basho o sadame, watashi-tachi mo anata mo sore o tagaenai yo ni shiyou
Kare (musa) wa itta. `Anata to no kaigo no yakusoku wa,-sai no hidearu. Hitobito o hirumae ni o atsume kudasai
Sokode firuaun wa hikitori, yagate keikaku o nette (kaette) kita

Musa wa kare-ra ni itta. `Anata gata wa wazawai ni audarou. Kare ga anata gata o shobatsu shite horobosa reru koto no nai yo, arra ni taishi netsuzo shi, uso o itte wa naranai. (Uso o) netsuzo suru mono wa kanarazu shippai suru
Sokode kare-ra wa otagai ni saku o nette ronji attaga, mochiron sono sodan wa himitsu ni shita
Kare-ra wa itta. `Tashikani ryonin wa majutsu-shidearu. Kare-ra wa ano majutsu de anata gata o kokudo kara oidashi, anata gata no sugureta narawashi o konzetsu shiyou to nozonde iru
Sorede kakuji no keikaku o neri, sorekara retsu o nashite takare. Kyo shori o eru mono wa, kanarazu sakaeru nodearu
Kare-ra wa itta. `Musa yo, anata ga nageru ka, soretomo watashi-tachi ga saki ni nageyou ka
Kare (musa) wa itta. `Iya, anata gataga sakini nage nasai.' Suru to miruga i. Kare ni wa nawa to tsue ga, majutsu de (ikite) hashiru ka no yo ni mieta
Sore de musa wa, sukoshi kokoro ni osore o kanjita
Ware wa itta. `Osoreru ni wa oyobanai. Hontoni anata ga jozudearu
Anata no migite ni aru mono o nage nasai. Kare-ra ga tsukutta mono o nomikome. Majutsu-shi no gomakashi nisuginai. Majutsu-shi wa doko kara kite mo,(nanigoto mo) seiko shinai
Sokode majutsu-shi-tachi wa, fuku shite sajida shi,`watashi-tachi wa, musa to harun no omo o shinko shimasu.' To itta

Kare (firuaun) wa itta. `Watashi ga yurusanai naka ni, kare o shinjiru no ka. Hontoni kare wa, anata gata ni majutsu o oshieta anata gata no tomokudearou. Anata gata no ryote to ryoashi o tagaichigai ni setsudan shite, natsumeyashi no kan ni haritsuke ni surudearou. Anata gata wa dochira no chobatsu ga yori genjude, eizoku suru ka kanarazu wakarudearou

Kare-ra (majutsu-shi) wa itta. `Watashi-tachi wa, watashi-tachi ni shimesa reta meihakuna shirushi, mata watashi-tachi o sozo nasa reta kare ijo ni, anata o omonjiru koto wa fukanodesu. Sorede anata no kettei sa reru koto o jisshi shite kudasai. Daga anata wa, gense no seikatsu ni oite dake, hanketsu nasaru ni sugimasen

Hontoni watashi-tachi ga omo o shinko suru no wa, watashi-tachi no go Chino o yurushi o koi, mata anata ga murijideshita majutsu ni taishite, o yurushi o kou tamedearimasu. Arra wa shizen ni shite towa ni iki rareru kata de ara remasu
Tsumibito to shite omo no omoto ni kuru mono ni wa, hontoni jigoku ga aru. Sono Chu de kare wa shi mo naku nama mo nai
Daga, oku no zenko o shite, shinja to shite kare no moto ni kita mono ni wa takai ikai o ataeru
Kare (shinja) wa eien ni kawa ga shita o nagareru adon (eden) no rakuen ni sumu nodearu. Kore wa, jibun o junketsu ni mamotta mono e no hoshodearu

Ware wa musa ni keiji shita. `Ware no shimo be-tachi to tomoni yoru ni tabidatte, kare-ra (Isuraeru no min) no tame ni, umi no naka ni kawaita michi o (anata no tsue de) uchi ake. (Firuaun no gunzei ni) oitsuka reru koto o shinpai suru na. Mata (umi o) kowagaru koto wanai
Hatashite firuaun wa, gunzei o hikiite kare-ra (Isuraeru no min) o ottaga, kaisui ga kare-ra o kanzen ni suichu ni shizume otte shimatta
(Ko no yo ni) firuaun wa sono min o mayowa se, tadashiku michibikanakatta nodearu
Isuraeru no shison yo, ware wa anata gata o teki kara sukui, mata (Shinai) yama no migigawa de anata gata to yakusoku o musubi, Man'na to uzura o anata gata ni kudashita

(Soshite ware wa itta. ) `Ware ga anata gata ni sazuketa yoi mono o tabe nasai. Saritote ware no ikari ga anata gata ni kudaranai yo,-ho o koete wa naranai. Dare demo ware no ikari ni fureru mono wa, kanarazu horobiru
Daga kaigo shite shinko shi, zenko ni isoshimi, sonogo (tadashiku) michibika reru mono ni wa, ware wa tabitabi kan'yo o shimesu
Musa yo, naze anata wa, jibun no min yori hanare, sakinjite isogu no ka
Kare wa moshiageta. `Kare-ra wa, watashi no ashiato o otte mairimasu. Omo yo, watashi wa anata ga o yorokobi ni naru yo isoida nodesu
Kare wa ose rareta. `Hontoni ware wa anata no satta nochi anata no min o kokoromitaga, samiri ga kare-ra o mayowa seta

Sokode musa wa, ikari kanashinde min no moto ni kaeri, itta. `Watashi no hitobito yo, anata gata no omo wa, yoi yakusoku o anata gata ni musuba renakatta nodesu ka. Anata gata ni wa amarini nagai yakusoku no yo ni omowa reta nodesu ka. Soretomo omo kara no o ikari ga anata gata ni kudaru koto o nozonda nodesu ka. Dakara watashi to no yakusoku o chigaeta nodesu ka

Kare-ra wa itta. `Watashi-tachi wa jibun ni tashikana konkyo ga atte, anata to no yakusoku o yabutta node wa nai nodesu. Watashi-tachi wa Ejiputo hito no, soshoku-hin no omoni o owasa retanode, sore o (hi no naka ni) nageireta nodesu. Samiri mo nagekonda yo nidesu
Sokode kare (samiri) wa, kare-ra (Isuraeru no min) no tame ni, hoeru koushi no guzo o tsukutta. Soshite itta. `Kore wa anata gata no kami de, mata musa no kamidesu, kare wa wasureta nodesu
Soreha, hitokoto mo kare-ra ni kotaezu, mata kare-ra ni gai mo naku eki mo nai koto ga wakaranai nodearou ka

Harun wa (kono koto no) mae ni, jubun ni kare-ra ni itta. `Hitobito yo. Anata gata wa kore ni yotte kokoromi rareru nodesu. Omo wa, hontoni jihibukai katadesu. Dakara watashi ni shitagai, watashi no meirei ni fukuju shi nasai
Kare-ra wa itta. `Watashi-tachi wa, musa ga kaette kuru made,(koushi) o ogami tsudzukerudeshou
Kare (musa) wa itta. `Harun yo, kare-ra ga mayou no o mita toki, nani ga anata (no gimu no riko) o samatageta nodesu ka
Watashi ni shitagawanai nodesu ka. Watashi no meirei ni somuku nodesu ka

Kare (harun) wa itta. `Watashi no haha no ko yo, watashi no hige ya atama (no kami) o tsukamu no o tomete kudasai. Hontoni watashi wa anata ga,“Isuraeru no shison no ma o bunretsu sa semashita. Mata jibun no kotoba o mamorimasendeshita. ” To iu no o osoreta nodesu
Kare (musa) wa itta. `De wa samiri yo, anata no (okonatta koto no) mokuteki wa nandesuka

Kare wa itta. `Watashi wa, kare-ra no minakatta mono o mita nodesu. Sorede shito no ashiato kara hitonigiri no (tsuchi) o totte, sore o (koushi no zo) ni nagetsuketa nodesu. Watashi no kokoro ga, so watashi ni shisa shita nodesu

Kare (musa) wa itta. `Dete iki nasai. Ikite iru kagiri wa,“-fuka sawa” to iu koto ni narou. Kesshite yaburenai yakusoku (shobatsu) ga anata ni wa aru. Anata ga nomerikonde suhai shite ita kamigami o mi nasai. Watashi-tachi wa kon'na mono wa yaite umi no naka ni makichirasudeshou
(Hitobito yo) hontoni anata gata no kami wa arra dakedesu. Kare no soto ni kami wa nai nodesu. Kare wa, subete no mono o sono o chishiki ni hoyo nasa remasu
Kono yo ni ware wa, izen ni okotta shosoku o anata ni katari, waga moto kara anata ni kunkai o kudashita
Dare demo sore ni somuku mono wa, fukkatsu no hi ni kanarazu omoni o oudearou
Kare-ra wa itsu made mo kono jotai no mamadearu. Fukkatsu no hi no omoni koso, kare-ra ni tori wazawaidearu
Rappa ga fuka reru hi, kono Ni~Tsu ware wa kumotta me no tsumibukaimono o shoshu suru
Kare-ra wa sasayaki atte,`anata gata wa 10 (Ni~Tsu) mo taizai shinakattadearou.' To iu
Ware wa kare-ra no iou to suru koto o yoku shitte iru. Sonotoki mo seko ni taketa mono ga,`watashi-tachi no taizai wa 1-nichi ni mo naranai.' To iudearou
Kare-ra wa yama ni tsuite, anata ni toudearou. Sokode itte yaru ga i. `Watashi no omo wa, sore o konagona ni shite maki chirasa reru
Kare wa, sore o tairana hirachi ni nasa re
soko ni wa, magari mo ototsu mo minaideshou
Sonohi kare-ra wa yobi-te ni shitagai hagureru wake ni wa ikanai. Jihibukai okata no gozende wa,-goe wa hikuku nari, shinobiashi no oto no soto wa kikanaidearou
Sonohi, jihibukai okata ni o yurushi o ete iru mono igai no torinashi wa muekidearou. Sono-sha no kotoba wa, kare ni ukeire rareru
Kare wa, kare-ra no mae ni aru koto, ushiro ni aru koto o shitte ora reru. Daga kare-ra (ningen) no chishikide wa, sore o hakari shiru koto wa dekinai
Kare-ra no kao wa, eisei shi jison suru okata no gozen de utsumuite irudearou. Soshite zaigo o ou mono ni, ukabu se wanai
Daga zenko ni isoshimi, shinko shita mono wa, nani no shinpai mo naku,(-nushi kara no hosho o) herasa reru koto mo nai nodearu
Kono yo ni, ware wa kono keiji o Arabia-go no kurua ― n to shite kudashi, sono Chu de iroiro to keikoku o tsutaeta. Tabun kare-ra wa omo o osore, matawa kyokun o etoku shiyou

Arra wa, ito takaku ora reru shin no ojadearu. Anata (yogen-sha muhanmado) ni taisuru keiji ga kanryo shinai mae ni, kuruan o isoide wa naranai. Mushiro (inotte) ii nasai. `Omo yo, watashi no chishiki o fukamete kudasai
Ware wa, izen ni adamu ni kaku to yakusoku shita. Daga kare wa (sono riko o) wasureta. Ware wa, kare ga sore ni kengodearu to wa mitomenai
Ware ga tenshi-tachi ni taishi,`adamu ni sajida shi nasai.' To itta toki o omoi nasai. Iburisu no soto kare-ra wa sajida shita. Daga kare wa kyohi shita
Sorede ware wa itta. `Adamu yo, hontoni kono-sha wa, anata to anata no tsuma no tekidearu. Sorede anata gata ryonin wa kono rakuen kara oidasa rete, fuko ni ochi iranai yo ki o tsuke nasai
Kokode wa, anata gata no tame ni (jubun no onmegumi ga atte) ue mo naku, hadaka ni naru koto mo nai
Mata kawaki o oboeru koto mo naku, taiyo no atsusa ni mo sarasa renai
Shikashi akuma wa kare ni sasayaite itta. `Adamu yo. Watashi wa anata ni eisei no ki to, otoroeru koto no nai oken o oshiete agemashou
Ryonin ga sore o taberu to, haji kashi tokoro ga arawa ni natta. Sore de kare-ra wa sono en no konoha de soko o oi hajimeta. Koshite adamu wa omoni somuki, go chi o okashita
Sonogo,-nushi wa kare o erabi, kaigo o yurusa re onmichibiki ni nara reta

Kare wa ose rareta. `Anata gata ryonin wa issho ni koko kara sagare. Anata-tachi wa tagaini teki de aru. Moshi anata gata ni ware kara michibiki ga kudareba, daredemo waga michibiki ni shitagau mono wa mayou koto naku, mata fuko ni ochiranaidearou
Daga dare demo, waga kunkai ni sewomukeru-sha wa, seikatsu ga kyukutsu ni nari, mata shinpan no hi ni wa momoku de yomigaera sa rerudearou
Kare wa iu. `Omo yo, watashi wa (izen) hare-gen-shadeatta no ni, naze watashi o momoku to shite yomigaera seta nodesu ka
Kare wa ose rareru. `Ware no shirushi ga anata ni kudatta toki, anata wa sore o mushi shitade wanai ka. Kyo anata wa sore to doyo mushi sa reru nodearu
Ware wa kono yo ni shite, somuita mono to omo no shirushi o shinjinakatta mono ni mukuiru. Daga raise ni okeru chobatsu wa, sarani kibishiku mata eizoku suru

Kare-ra ni wa onmichibiki wa nakatta no ka. Kare-ra yori izen ni mo ware wa don'nani oku no sedai o horoboshita koto ka. Kare-ra (kojin) no sunde ita tokoro o (ima) kare-ra wa aruite iru. Hontoni kono nakaniha richi ni tomu mono e no shirushi ga aru
Moshi,-nushi kara o kotoba ga kudasa rete inakattanaraba,(chobatsu wa) yoke rarenai nodearu. Daga, sadame rareta (yuyo no) kigen ga aru

Dakara kare-ra no iu koto o shinobi, taiyo ga agaru mae, mata sore ga shizumu mae ni, anata no omo no eiko o tatae nasai. Nao yoru no ichiji mo, mata hiru no ryotan ni mo tatae nasai. Kanarazu anata gata wa mitasarerudearou

Mata ware ga, kare-ra no aru burui no mono ni ataeta konoyo no seikatsu no eiga ni, anata no me o mihatte wa naranai. Ware wa, sore ni yotte kare-ra o kokoromita. Anata no omo no tamamono koso shijo de mata eizoku suru

Mata anata no kazoku ni reihai o meiji, soshite (anata mo), sore o tae nasai. Ware wa anata ni onmegumi o motomenai. Anata gata ni megumi o ataeru no wa waredearu. Zenka wa omo o osoreru mono no ue ni aru
Mata kare-ra wa,`nazekare wa, watashi-tachi ni omo kara hitotsu no shirushi o mo motarasanai nodesu ka.' To iu. Izen no sho Keisuke ni aru meisho ga, kare-ra ni kudatte irude wanai ka

Ware ga moshi kore izen ni kare-ra o shobatsu shite, horoboshite itanaraba, kare-ra wa kanarazu,`omo yo, naze anata wa, watashi-tachi ni shito o tsukawasa renakatta nodesu ka. So sureba watashi-tachi wa, iyashima re kutsujoku o komuru mae ni, anata no shirushi ni shitagattadeshou ni.' To ittadearou
Gen tte yaru ga i. `Kakujin wa matte iru. Dakara anata gata mo mate. Anata gata wa yagate, heitan'na michi o ayumu mono wa dare ka, mata michibika reta mono wa dare ka o shirudearou
